thread.title: Palace Class hotel
thread.title_full: Palace Class hotel - Review of The Peninsula Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: KING KONG C
title: Palace Class hotel
text: A hotel is of above 5 star standard. You can taste what it palace class hotel in Paris. To my understanding, there are 6 hotels in Paris which could hold palace class and Peninsula Paris is one of them. Form the moment you come out the cab till the check out, you would be treated as a VIP. Regarding the room, it is classic while keep a hi tech facilities. Come and enjoy the first class hotel and you would not be disappointed.
